title: What the fuck is going on with ranked?
body: Why is it complete punstomps? I was almost gold V this season. I take a break for a week and come back, and I  can't do anything even if im doing well.

replies.body:
Ranked has been pubstomps for several seasons.

The goal in the coming season is to increase individual agency a bit, decrease stompage, and end the whole "game decided by 5 minute" shit.
To be fair..... I switched to a more centralized champ roster and I'm back to hard carrying :S.

If someone on the enemy team is doing crazy good, after the game check their op.gg. If they are out of nowhere on a fiery climbing streak (usually with champs they don't play) report them for boosting. Its bad this year, its no fun to play rank rn even with all the cool new shit.
Because everyone and their mom, and their dog, and their mom's dog, is smurfing because they've already achieved their desired rank and want to prevent lower elo players from doing the same.
